title: Ali Hogben
deck: I moved to York in 2008 when I married Sarah. We now have two brilliant children, Josiah and Eliana, to complement our often busy and crazy home! As part of the church I am passionate about seeing people meet with God in worship and am part of the amazing team here at Gateway who help that to happen. When I am not doing that, I work for a high end property company and enjoy a host of hobbies, from cycling to board games!
words: The importance of a heavenly perspective
